attributes.action: pull all our troops out of Iraq and send them into Zimbabwe to ensure that Robert Mugabe is not again allowed to usurp the vote of the people of that country by falsifying the result.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Robert Mugabe is the arch dictator, he cannot allow himself to be defeated and will use the military forces of Zimbabwe, whose generals are all in his pocket, to enforce his position.  Iraq is a lost cause and a waste of money, let's get our armed forces to do something which is worthwhile, for a change.
